video_prompt: The jeweled praying mantis sculpture slowly rotates, catching light across its glittering gemstones, subtly shifting its head and antennae. The background subtly darkens and brightens, causing the mantis's sparkle to undulate. Its soft shadow elongates and shortens on the textured surface as the light source subtly changes position.
image_prompt: **Luxurious jeweled praying mantis sculpture, gold, white diamonds, pink and yellow sapphires, single green emerald, dark textured background, dramatic lighting, intricate detail, opulent.**
refined_video_prompt: Light undulates across a slowly rotating jeweled mantis sculpture, making its gemstones sparkle and its head subtly shift, antennae twitching. The background fluidly darkens and brightens. Its soft shadow lengthens and shortens as the light source shifts.
